mapper.select: SELECT order_id, branch_id, order_date, order_status, order_price, order_deny FROM orders WHERE branch_id = #{branchId} ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_item_id, order_id, part_id, order_item_quantity, order_item_price FROM order_item WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT oi.part_id AS partId, p.part_name AS partName, p.part_cate AS partCate, oi.order_item_quantity AS quantity, oi.order_item_price AS partPrice FROM order_item oi JOIN parts p ON oi.part_id = p.part_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
